title: Update on Account Recovery Situation

embed.description: So Ive been travelling around 3 countries for the past 6 months (Canada, Uk, China) and playing league here and there during the travels. And Im guessing this is the reason Riot suspended my account.

body:
Linked is my previous post if youre interested in the full chronology of events.

So after a live chat with a Rioter, they still say that they are unable to verify me as the owner of the account when I have given credit card info, phone number, creation email, first champion gifted, friends-since-creation, birthday etc...

So now I still cannot retrieve my account that I had been playing since 7-8 years ago...

Not sure what I can do...

P.S. They still havent replied my manual ticket that was sent more than a week ago... [Imgur for proof](https://imgur.com/gallery/mcn3VJg) (and their previous automated response)

replies.body:
To be completely honest, I'm still not entirely sure what you are hoping to accomplish by verifying yourself as the account owner.
You are accused of account sharing, not of not being the owner.
Im not sure too, but the support said he cannot verify im the real owner ----- Updated the imgur link for his entire response.

**Unrelated but important: You forgot to censor the phone number in the updated picture.**

Okay... I'm starting to get a clearer picture now than I had in the other thread.
That is really a bit weird. The way they talk about you not being the **creator** of the account seems to imply they believe the account was sold or transferred to you.

Oh sh*t
Censoring it now
Thanks buddy

Yeah not to mention that I do have info on the first champions bought /gifted etc and friends since creation so I dont know why they are still doubting that.

I’m so sorry {{sticker:sg-janna}} if there’s ANYTHING I can do I will. I know I would be heartbroken in a situation like this. Props to you for being strong and fighting to get it back. I’m going to reach level 39 JUST so I can upvote to try and get riot to see it. There is a lot of very good moderators that roam these pages and maybe one of them will see it. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Damn. Anyone got tantrams number for this?

That sucks! I added you to play chill games.. I just thought you were mad at me! lol

I hope this gets all worked out

Haha oh right I remember you from the other thread! 
Thanks for the support man!
(cant help but think its ironic whenever I use the word "support" in these threads)
thank god i have not invested above 20$ into my account, id hate to lose it just because they can't verify who you are (BS btw).  its just that riot support can't bother to do their job.
Riot is lame, they never helped me with my accounts. Never.
this sucks man I am sorry to hear it.
Dont think Ive used proxy. Unless the hotel wifi I was using on have proxy added...
